events.message: The policyholder reported an auto collision involving their vehicle on Highway 45, resulting in substantial damage to the front bumper and airbags deployed.
The claim has been categorised under Auto Accident due to keywords in the initial report including collision and vehicle damage.
An experienced claims agent has been assigned to assist the customer with their vehicle accident claim for quicker resolution.
Acknowledgment of receipt of the auto accident claim was sent to the insured, confirming that processing has begun.
Supporting documents such as the police report, vehicle repair estimate, and photographs of the damaged car have been requested from the claimant.
The customer submitted all requested documentation, including repair shop invoices and accident photographs, enabling further claim processing.
The claim investigation began to verify damages and liability based on submitted evidence and third-party witness statements.
Investigation completed successfully, confirming the vehicle damage was consistent with the collision detailed in the claim report.
A fair settlement offer was proposed to the claimant based on repair estimates and policy coverage terms.
The policyholder expressed satisfaction with the timely communication and fairness of the proposed settlement for their auto accident claim.
The claim was formally approved by the claims committee after thorough review and confirmation of all documentation.
The approved settlement amount was successfully disbursed to the insuredâ€™s bank account as per the agreed terms.
The auto accident claim was closed after all payments were made and the customer confirmed no further issues remain.
